Travelling

«Nothing develops the mind like travel»
Émile Zola

Travelling to new and interesting countries has always attracted people. It’s like a part of routine. People work for some time and then they travel during their holidays. The choice of a place depends on their interests and wishes, on their finances and the length of the holidays.

Posted by Eugenia, on november 18, 2015

Continue reading

Wonders of Nature

It is a very great possibility to witness such wonders of nature.

Nature sometimes creates unique objects that can amaze by their beauty even the most sophisticated and skeptical people. Probably that is why regularly varied organizations, such as TV-channel BBC and the company CNN, generate lists of the most interesting miraculous objects worldwide.

Posted by Maxim, on july 20, 2015

Continue reading

Water

Travelling By Sea

There are numerous means of travelling, but many people choose to travel by sea. I’m sure they have a number of reasons for that. First of all, it is a pleasant feeling to be in boundless expanse of the sea or ocean. Secondly, travelling by sea is comfortable and speedy.

Posted by Egor, on october 15, 2017

Continue reading

Tourism

Tourism is becoming more and more popular.

There are so many means of travelling around the world, such as jet-planes, express trains, cruise liners, comfortable buses, personal cars and else. We can choose what’s best for us. I’m glad that tourism has become more available because I love travelling.

Posted by Ann, on may 18, 2016

Continue reading

Forest

How to increase your productivity with a forest wibe

Forests are also very good for the environment. The trees and flowers give oxygen to the atmosphere that makes the air much cleaner to breathe. The forest is also a source of food. We can pick up mushrooms and different kinds of berries there. The flowers and trees are very beautiful.

Posted by Lena, on april 30, 2020

Continue reading

Silence

Silense in forest

The forest is a place filled with trees and animals of all different kinds. There are many things that we can do in the forest. Many people go hiking through the woods, there are special paths that lead to the interesting parts. Many of these special places are lakes or fields for example. At the lakes people usually go fishing, or swimming, and sometimes use small boats. In the forest it is possible to go hunting and to watch for some kinds of animals.

Posted by Andrew, on november 18, 2018

Continue reading

Nature

Nature is one of the broadest concepts.

It includes the light of distant stars, vast expanses of the oceans, forests and meadows, roaring waterfalls, etc. The role of nature in the society has always been significant. People are literally dependent on it. At the same time nature depends on people and their behavior too.

Posted by Alex, on june 17, 2018
